Comment.Language: For the Entrance of the Lord Christ into the Land of Egypt from the Resurrection of our Lord to the 39th day of the Pentecost Period:

Text.Language: All/louia: all/louia. I/couc Pi,~rictoc p~ouro n~te p~w~ou aftwnf e~bolqen n/eymwout qen pie~hoou m~mahsomt. afi~ e~qoun e~p~kahi n~,/mi: all/louia: all/louia.
Alleluia, Alleluia. Jesus Christ, the King of Glory, rose from the dead on the third day; entered into the land of Egypt. Alleluia, Alleluia.
